name: Super Ario - The Great Game That Terrified James Cameron
name_original: Super Ario - The Great Game That Terrified James Cameron
description:
GG, the unhappy Computer game, wants to become the most unique and original game that ever crossed the world! So that creatives like James Cameron or  Mozart would bury their faces in shame, when gazing upon such original beauty!!
Will GG succeed?

The original voice-acting was entirely done by   Jeffrey Allen Sneed,  check him out here!
https://instagram.com/jeffreyallensneed?igshid=YmMyMTA2M2Y=
